text: This is a blog post about downloading the TV show "Such Brave Girls" with subtitles and high definition video quality. The post provides links to various file hosting services such as Xunlei Pan, Aliyan, Baidu Netdisk, and magnet links for BitTorrent. It also mentions that there are two types of releases - one with embedded Chinese or multiple subtitle tracks (named "熟肉") and another without any subtitles (named "生肉"). The sizes of the files range from 3.7 GB to 16.91 GB depending on the resolution and presence of subtitles. At the end of the post, there's an invitation to scan a QR code, search for "影的后花园", or follow ID "BluFilm" in WeChat to subscribe to the public account "影的后花园".
